word: PAGES 15-20: PORTRAYAL OF FUTURE EVENTS.--AS MRS. WHITE DESCRIBED THAT WHICH GOD REVEALED TO HER CONCERNING FUTURE EVENTS, SHE DID SO, AT TIMES, AS ONE PARTICIPATING IN THESE EVENTS, WHETHER THEY WERE IN THE PAST OR THE PRESENT OR THE FUTURE. IN RESPONSE TO INQUIRIES AS TO HER STATE IN VISION, SHE WROTE:
